      • GeneralIRTMeter

        public GeneralIRTMeter(AbstractConnection connection,
               PCLinkLibraryEnum.MeterUsers meterUser,
               int txOneByteDelayInMillis,
               int txCommandDelayInMillis,
               int rxTimeoutInMillis,
               int retryTimes)
        Construct a GeneralIRTMeter object.

        In some case, the specific meter has custom delay time and timeout time setting

        Parameters:
        connection - AbstractConnection
        meterUser - PCLinkLibraryEnum.MeterUsers
        txOneByteDelayInMillis - Delay milliseconds between every sending byte (unit:milliseconds)
        txCommandDelayInMillis - Delay milliseconds between every sending byte (unit:milliseconds)
        rxTimeoutInMillis - Timeout milliseconds for rx data receive (unit:milliseconds)
        retryTimes - retry times to send cmd
